name: Flock Simulator
description:
WASD to control the black bird.  The red birds will move towards the black bird, but they are hard to guide.  Try to guide the birds through the levels to reach the tree.  The birds die when they hit the buildings.

The first few levels are easy, and the last few are a bit of a challenge.  I didn't put in a level selector, maybe next time.

Made for Mini Jam 97: Simulation.  Limitation Movement is Lethal.

Concept suggested by PineberryFox on Discord
